content: शरः [शॄ-अच्] {@--1@} An arrow, a shaft; क्व च निशितनिपाता वज्रसाराः शरास्ते <ls>Ś. 1. 10.</ls> {@--2@} A kind of white reed or grass; शरकांडपांडुगंडस्थला <ls>M. 3. 8</ls>; मुखंन सीता शरपाडुरेण <ls>R. 14. 26</ls>: <ls>Śi. 11. 30.</ls> {@--3@} The cream of slightly curdled milk, cream {@--4@} Hurt, injury, wound. {@--5@} The number ‘five.’ --रं Water.
